00057 void _syx_interp_save_process_state (void);

00092 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Object_at)
00093 {
00094   syx_varsize index;
00095   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00096   index = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER(es->message_arguments[0]) - 1;
00097   if (index < 0 || index >= SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(es->message_receiver))
00098     {
00099       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00100     }
00101   SYX_PRIM_RETURN(SYX_OBJECT_DATA(es->message_receiver)[index]);
00102 }

00104 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Object_at_put)
00105 {
00106   syx_varsize index;
00107   SyxOop object;
00108   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
00109   
00110   if (SYX_OBJECT_IS_CONSTANT (es->message_receiver))
00111     {
00112       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00113     }
00114 
00115   index = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER(es->message_arguments[0]) - 1;
00116   if (index < 0 || index >= SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(es->message_receiver))
00117     {
00118       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00119     }
00120 
00121   object = es->message_arguments[1];
00122   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(es->message_receiver)[index] = object;
00123 
00124   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (object);
00125 }

00138 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Object_size)
00139 {
00140   if (!SYX_IS_OBJECT (es->message_receiver))
00141     {
00142       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (0));
00143     }
00144 
00145   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE (es->message_receiver)));

00176 /* This primitive handles both #perform: and #perform:with: */
00177 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Object_perform)
00178 {
00179   SyxOop klass;
00180   SyxOop message_method;
00181   SyxOop selector;
00182   SyxOop message_arguments[0xFF];
00183   syx_varsize message_arguments_count;
00184   syx_int32 primitive;
00185   syx_bool ret = TRUE;
00186 
00187   SYX_START_PROFILE;
00188 
00189   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00190 
00191   selector = es->message_arguments[0];
00192   klass = syx_object_get_class (es->message_receiver); 
00193   message_method = syx_class_lookup_method (klass, SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (selector));
00194 
00195   if (SYX_IS_NIL (message_method))
00196     {
00197       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00198     }
00199 
00200   if (SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (SYX_CODE_ARGUMENTS_COUNT (message_method)) != es->message_arguments_count - 1)
00201     {
00202       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00203     }
00204 
00205   /* save the real state */
00206   memcpy (message_arguments, es->message_arguments, es->message_arguments_count * sizeof (SyxOop));
00207   message_arguments_count = es->message_arguments_count;
00208 
00209   es->message_arguments_count--;
00210   /* Check for #perform:with: then shift the only argument to the right by one */
00211   if (es->message_arguments_count)
00212     es->message_arguments[0] = es->message_arguments[1];
00213 
00214   primitive = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (SYX_METHOD_PRIMITIVE (message_method));
00215   if (primitive >= 0 && primitive < SYX_PRIMITIVES_MAX)
00216     ret = syx_interp_call_primitive (primitive, message_method);
00217   else if (primitive == -2)
00218     ret = syx_plugin_call_interp (es, message_method);
00219   else
00220     _syx_interp_frame_prepare_new (es, message_method);
00221 
00222   /* restore the state */
00223   memcpy (es->message_arguments, message_arguments, message_arguments_count * sizeof (SyxOop));
00224   es->message_arguments_count = message_arguments_count;
00225 
00226   SYX_END_PROFILE(perform_message);
00227 
00228   return ret;
00229 }
00230 
00231 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Object_performWithArguments)
00232 {
00233   SyxOop klass;
00234   SyxOop message_method;
00235   SyxOop selector;
00236   SyxOop arguments;
00237   SyxOop message_arguments[0xFF];
00238   syx_varsize message_arguments_count;
00239   syx_int32 primitive;
00240   syx_bool ret = TRUE;
00241   
00242   SYX_START_PROFILE;
00243 
00244   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
00245 
00246   selector = es->message_arguments[0];
00247   arguments = es->message_arguments[1];
00248 
00249   klass = syx_object_get_class (es->message_receiver); 
00250   message_method = syx_class_lookup_method (klass, SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (selector));
00251 
00252   if (SYX_IS_NIL (message_method))
00253     {
00254       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00255     }
00256 
00257   if (SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (SYX_CODE_ARGUMENTS_COUNT (message_method)) != SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE (arguments))
00258     {
00259       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00260     }
00261 
00262   /* save the real state */
00263   memcpy (message_arguments, es->message_arguments, es->message_arguments_count * sizeof (SyxOop));
00264   message_arguments_count = es->message_arguments_count;
00265   if (SYX_IS_NIL (arguments))
00266     es->message_arguments_count = 0;
00267   else
00268     {
00269       es->message_arguments_count = SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(arguments);
00270       memcpy (es->message_arguments, SYX_OBJECT_DATA (arguments), es->message_arguments_count * sizeof (SyxOop));
00271     }
00272 
00273   primitive = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (SYX_METHOD_PRIMITIVE (message_method));
00274   if (primitive >= 0 && primitive < SYX_PRIMITIVES_MAX)
00275     ret = syx_interp_call_primitive (primitive, message_method);
00276   else if (primitive == -2)
00277     ret = syx_plugin_call_interp (es, message_method);
00278   else
00279     _syx_interp_frame_prepare_new (es, message_method);
00280 
00281   /* restore the state */
00282   memcpy (es->message_arguments, message_arguments, message_arguments_count * sizeof (SyxOop));
00283   es->message_arguments_count = message_arguments_count;
00284 
00285   SYX_END_PROFILE(perform_message);
00286 
00287   return ret;
00288 }
00289 
00290 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (ArrayedCollection_replaceFromToWithStartingAt)
00291 {
00292   syx_varsize start;
00293   SyxOop coll;
00294   syx_varsize end;
00295   syx_varsize length;
00296   syx_varsize collstart;
00297   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(3);
00298 
00299   start = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[0]) - 1;
00300   coll = es->message_arguments[2];
00301   end = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER(es->message_arguments[1]);
00302   collstart = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER(es->message_arguments[3]) - 1;
00303   length = end - start;
00304 
00305   if (!SYX_IS_OBJECT (coll) || !SYX_OBJECT_DATA (coll))
00306     {
00307       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00308     }
00309 
00310   if (start >= end || end > SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE (es->message_receiver))
00311     {
00312       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00313     }
00314 
00315   if (length > SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE (coll))
00316     {
00317       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00318     }
00319 
00320   /* distinguish between arrays and bytearrays */
00321   if (SYX_OBJECT_HAS_REFS (es->message_receiver))
00322     {
00323       if (SYX_OBJECT_HAS_REFS (coll))
00324         memcpy (SYX_OBJECT_DATA (es->message_receiver) + start, SYX_OBJECT_DATA (coll) + collstart,
00325                 length * sizeof (SyxOop));
00326       else
00327         {
00328           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00329         }
00330     }
00331   else
00332     {
00333       if (!SYX_OBJECT_HAS_REFS (coll))
00334         memcpy (SYX_OBJECT_BYTE_ARRAY (es->message_receiver) + start,
00335                 SYX_OBJECT_BYTE_ARRAY (coll) + collstart, length * sizeof (syx_int8));
00336       else
00337         {
00338           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00339         }
00340     }
00341 
00342   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (es->message_receiver);
00343 }
00344 
00345 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (ByteArray_at)
00346 {
00347   syx_varsize index;
00348   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00349 
00350   index = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER(es->message_arguments[0]) - 1;
00351   if (index < 0 || index >= SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(es->message_receiver))
00352     {
00353       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00354     }
00355   SYX_PRIM_RETURN(syx_small_integer_new (SYX_OBJECT_BYTE_ARRAY(es->message_receiver)[index]));
00356 }

00358 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (ByteArray_at_put)
00359 {
00360   syx_varsize index;
00361   SyxOop oop;
00362   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
00363 
00364   if (SYX_OBJECT_IS_CONSTANT (es->message_receiver))
00365     {
00366       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00367     }
00368 
00369   index = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER(es->message_arguments[0]) - 1;
00370   if (index < 0 || index >= SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(es->message_receiver))
00371     {
00372       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00373     }
00374   
00375   oop = es->message_arguments[1];
00376   if (!SYX_IS_SMALL_INTEGER (oop) || SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (oop) < 0 || SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (oop) > 255)
00377     {
00378       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00379     }
00380   SYX_OBJECT_BYTE_ARRAY(es->message_receiver)[index] = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (oop);
00381   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (oop);
00382 }

00390   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (ctx);

00393 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (BlockClosure_value)
00394 {
00395   /* Unset arguments for the execution of the block */
00396   es->message_arguments_count = 0;
00397   _syx_interp_frame_prepare_new_closure (es, es->message_receiver);
00398   return TRUE;
00399 }
00400 
00401 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (BlockClosure_valueWith)
00402 {
00403   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00404 
00405   /* The only argument for this primitive is right the same argument for the block */
00406   _syx_interp_frame_prepare_new_closure (es, es->message_receiver);
00407   return TRUE;
00408 }
00409   
00410 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (BlockClosure_valueWithArguments)
00411 {
00412   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00413 
00414   es->message_arguments_count = SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE (es->message_arguments[0]);
00415   memcpy (es->message_arguments, SYX_OBJECT_DATA (es->message_arguments[0]), es->message_arguments_count * sizeof (SyxOop));
00416   _syx_interp_frame_prepare_new_closure (es, es->message_receiver);
00417   return TRUE;
00418 }

00420 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (BlockClosure_on_do)
00421 {
00422   SyxOop ctx;
00423   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
00424 
00425   ctx = syx_block_context_new (es->message_receiver, syx_nil);
00426 
00427   SYX_BLOCK_CONTEXT_HANDLED_EXCEPTION (ctx) = es->message_arguments[0];
00428   SYX_BLOCK_CONTEXT_HANDLER_BLOCK (ctx) = es->message_arguments[1];
00429 
00430   return syx_interp_enter_context (syx_processor_active_process, ctx);
00431 }
00432 
00433 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (BlockClosure_newProcess)
00434 {
00435   SyxOop ctx;
00436   SyxOop proc;
00437 
00438   syx_memory_gc_begin ();
00439   proc = syx_process_new ();
00440   ctx = syx_block_context_new (es->message_receiver, syx_nil);
00441   syx_interp_enter_context (proc, ctx);
00442   syx_memory_gc_end ();
00443 
00444   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (proc);
00445 }

00513 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Semaphore_wait)

00517 }
00518 
00519 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Semaphore_waitFor)
00520 {
00521   syx_nint fd;
00522   syx_bool t;
00523   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
00524 
00525 #ifdef WINDOWS
00526   fd = _get_osfhandle (SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[0]));
00527 #else
00528   fd = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[0]);
00529 #endif /* WINDOWS */
00530   t = SYX_IS_TRUE (es->message_arguments[1]);
00531   syx_semaphore_wait (es->message_receiver);
00532   if (t == syx_true)
00533     syx_scheduler_poll_write_register (fd,
00534                                        es->message_receiver);
00535   else
00536     syx_scheduler_poll_read_register (fd,
00537                                       es->message_receiver);
00538   SYX_PRIM_YIELD (es->message_receiver);
00539 }

00543 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (StdIOStream_nextPut)
00544 {
00545   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00546   if (fputc (SYX_CHARACTER(es->message_arguments[0]), stdout) == EOF)
00547     {
00548       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00549     }
00550   SYX_PRIM_RETURN(es->message_receiver);
00551 }

00554 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (StdIOStream_nextPutAll)
00555 {
00556   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00557   if (fputs (SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL(es->message_arguments[0]), stdout) == EOF)
00558     {
00559       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00560     }
00561   SYX_PRIM_RETURN(es->message_receiver);
00562 }
00563 
00564 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (FileStream_fileOp)
00565 {
00566   syx_int32 op;
00567   FILE *file;
00568   syx_int32 ret;
00569   syx_symbol mode;
00570   syx_char c;
00571   syx_int32 count;
00572   syx_string s;
00573   SyxOop string;
00574 #ifdef HAVE_FSTAT
00575   struct stat statbuf;
00576 #endif
00577 
00578   SYX_START_PROFILE;
00579 
00580   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
00581 
00582   op = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[0]);
00583   file = SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (es->message_arguments[1]);
00584   ret = 0;
00585 
00586   /* except fopen and fdopen ops */
00587   if (op != 0 && op != 8 && !file) 
00588     {
00589       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00590     }
00591 
00592   switch (op)
00593     {
00594     case 0: /* open */
00595       if (!SYX_OBJECT_IS_STRING (es->message_arguments[1]) || !SYX_OBJECT_IS_STRING (es->message_arguments[2]))
00596         {
00597           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00598         }
00599 
00600       mode = SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (es->message_arguments[2]);
00601       if (!(file = fopen (SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL(es->message_arguments[1]), mode)))
00602         {
00603           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00604         }
00605 
00606       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (SYX_POINTER_CAST_OOP (file));
00607       break;
00608 
00609     case 1: /* close */
00610       ret = fclose (file);
00611       break;
00612       
00613     case 2: /* nextPut: */
00614       SYX_PRIM_ARGS(3);
00615       if (!SYX_IS_CHARACTER (es->message_arguments[2]))
00616         {
00617           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00618         }
00619 
00620       ret = fputc (SYX_CHARACTER (es->message_arguments[2]), file);
00621       break;
00622 
00623     case 3: /* nextPutAll: */
00624       SYX_PRIM_ARGS(3);
00625 
00626       if (SYX_IS_NIL (es->message_arguments[2]))
00627         {
00628           ret = 0;
00629           break;
00630         }
00631 
00632       ret = fwrite (SYX_OBJECT_DATA (es->message_arguments[2]),
00633                     sizeof (syx_int8),
00634                     SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE (es->message_arguments[2]),
00635                     file);
00636       break;
00637 
00638     case 4: /* flush */
00639       ret = fflush (file);
00640       break;
00641 
00642     case 5: /* next */
00643       count = read (fileno (file), &c, 1);
00644 
00645       if (!count)
00646         {
00647           /* EOF */
00648           SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_nil);
00649         }
00650       
00651       if (count < 0)
00652         {
00653           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00654         }
00655 
00656       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_character_new (c));
00657       break;
00658 
00659     case 6: /* next: */
00660       SYX_PRIM_ARGS(3);
00661 
00662       if (feof (file))
00663         {
00664           SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_nil);
00665         }
00666 
00667       count = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[2]);
00668       s = (syx_string) syx_malloc (count+1);
00669       count = read (fileno (file), s, count);
00670 
00671       if (!count)
00672         {
00673           syx_free (s);
00674           SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_nil);
00675         }
00676 
00677       if (count < 0)
00678         {
00679           syx_free (s);
00680           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00681         }
00682 
00683       s[count] = '\0';
00684       string = syx_string_new_ref (s);
00685       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (string);
00686       break;
00687 
00688     case 7: /* size */
00689 #ifdef HAVE_FSTAT
00690       if ((fstat (fileno(file), &statbuf)) < 0)
00691         {
00692           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00693         }
00694       
00695       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (statbuf.st_size));
00696 #else
00697       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (0));
00698 #endif
00699       break;
00700 
00701     case 8: /* fdopen */
00702       if (SYX_OBJECT_IS_SYMBOL (es->message_arguments[1]))
00703         {
00704           if (!strcmp (SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (es->message_arguments[1]), "stdin"))
00705             {
00706               SYX_PRIM_RETURN (SYX_POINTER_CAST_OOP (stdin));
00707             }
00708           else if (!strcmp (SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (es->message_arguments[1]), "stdout"))
00709             {
00710               SYX_PRIM_RETURN (SYX_POINTER_CAST_OOP (stdout));
00711             }
00712           else if (!strcmp (SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (es->message_arguments[1]), "stderr"))
00713             {
00714               SYX_PRIM_RETURN (SYX_POINTER_CAST_OOP (stderr));
00715             }
00716           else
00717             {
00718               SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00719             }
00720         }
00721       if (!SYX_OBJECT_IS_STRING (es->message_arguments[2]))
00722         {
00723           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00724         }
00725       mode = SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (es->message_arguments[2]);
00726       if (!(file = fdopen (SYX_SMALL_INTEGER(es->message_arguments[1]), mode)))
00727         {
00728           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00729         }
00730       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (SYX_POINTER_CAST_OOP (file));
00731       break;
00732     case 9: /* fileno */
00733       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (fileno (file)));
00734       break;
00735 
00736     default: /* unknown */
00737       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00738     }
00739 
00740   SYX_END_PROFILE(fileop);
00741 
00742   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (ret));
00743 }
00744 
00745 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (String_hash)
00746 {
00747   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (syx_string_hash (SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (es->message_receiver))));
00748 }
00749 
00750 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (String_asSymbol)
00751 {
00752   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_symbol_new (SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (es->message_receiver)));
00753 }

00755 /* Small integers */
00756 
00757 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (SmallInteger_plus)
00758 { 
00759   SyxOop first, second;
00760   syx_int32 a, b, result;
00761   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00762 
00763   first = es->message_receiver;
00764   second = es->message_arguments[0];
00765   if (!SYX_IS_SMALL_INTEGER (second))
00766     {
00767       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00768     }
00769 
00770   a = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (first);
00771   b = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (second);
00772   if (SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_SUM_OVERFLOW (a, b))
00773     {
00774       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00775     }
00776 
00777   result = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (first) + SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (second);
00778   if (!SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_CAN_EMBED (result))
00779     {
00780       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00781     }
00782 
00783   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (result));
00784 }
00785 
00786 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (SmallInteger_minus)
00787 { 
00788   SyxOop first, second;
00789   syx_int32 a, b, result;
00790   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00791 
00792   first = es->message_receiver;
00793   second = es->message_arguments[0];
00794   if (!SYX_IS_SMALL_INTEGER (second))
00795     {
00796       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00797     }
00798 
00799   a = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (first);
00800   b = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (second);
00801   if (SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_DIFF_OVERFLOW (a, b))
00802     {
00803       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00804     }
00805 
00806   result = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (first) - SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (second);
00807   if (!SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_CAN_EMBED (result))
00808     {
00809       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00810     }
00811 
00812   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (result));
00813 }
00814

00902 
00903 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (SmallInteger_div)
00904 {
00905   SyxOop second;
00906   syx_int32 a, b;
00907   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00908 
00909   second = es->message_arguments[0];
00910   if (!SYX_IS_SMALL_INTEGER (second))
00911     {
00912       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00913     }
00914   a = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_receiver);
00915   b = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (second);
00916   if (!b)
00917     {
00918       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00919     }
00920 
00921   if (a % b)
00922     {
00923       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00924     }
00925   if (SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_DIV_OVERFLOW (a, b))
00926     {
00927       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00928     }
00929   
00930   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (a / b));
00931 }
00932 
00933 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (SmallInteger_mul)
00934 {
00935   SyxOop first, second;
00936   syx_int32 a, b, result;
00937   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
00938 
00939   first = es->message_receiver;
00940   second = es->message_arguments[0];
00941   if (!SYX_IS_SMALL_INTEGER (second))
00942     {
00943       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00944     }
00945 
00946   a = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (first);
00947   b = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (second);
00948 
00949   if (SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_MUL_OVERFLOW (a, b))
00950     {
00951       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00952     }
00953 
00954   result = a * b;
00955   if (!SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_CAN_EMBED (result))
00956     {
00957       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00958     }
00959 
00960   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (result));
00961 }
00962

00973     }

00975                                           SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (second)));

01020                                           SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (second)));

01022 
01023 /* Thanks to Sam Philiphs for this contribute */
01024 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (SmallInteger_bitShift)
01025 {
01026   SyxOop arg;
01027   syx_int32 val, shift;
01028   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
01029 
01030   val = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER(es->message_receiver);
01031   arg = es->message_arguments[0];
01032   if (!SYX_IS_SMALL_INTEGER (arg))
01033     {
01034       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01035     }
01036 
01037   shift = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (arg);
01038 
01039   if (SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_SHIFT_OVERFLOW (val, shift))
01040     {
01041       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01042     }
01043   
01044   if (shift >= 0)
01045     {
01046       val <<= shift;
01047       if (!SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_CAN_EMBED (val))
01048         {
01049           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01050         }
01051       
01052       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (val));
01053     }
01054   else
01055     {
01056       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (val >> abs(shift)));
01057     }
01058 }
01059 
01060 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (SmallInteger_asFloat)
01061 {
01062   syx_double n = (syx_double)SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_receiver);
01063   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_float_new (n));
01064 }

01066 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (SmallInteger_asLargeInteger)
01067 {
01068 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
01069   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_large_integer_new_integer (SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_receiver)));
01070 #else
01071   SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01072 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
01073 }
01074 
01075 
01076 /* Large integers */
01077 
01078 #define _GET_Z mpz_t *z = (mpz_t *)SYX_OBJECT_DATA (es->message_receiver);
01079 #define _GET_Z2 mpz_t *op2; _GET_Z
01080 #define _GET_Z2R mpz_t *r; syx_int32 ret; _GET_Z2
01081 #define _GET_ZR mpz_t *r; syx_int32 ret; _GET_Z
01082 #define _GET_OP2 SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1); if (!SYX_OBJECT_IS_LARGE_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[0])) { SYX_PRIM_FAIL; } \
01083   op2 = (mpz_t *)SYX_OBJECT_DATA (es->message_arguments[0]);
01084 #define _NEW_R r = syx_calloc (1, sizeof (mpz_t)); mpz_init (*r)
01085 #define _RET_R if (mpz_fits_sint_p (*r) && SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_CAN_EMBED (mpz_get_si (*r))) \
01086     { ret = mpz_get_si (*r); mpz_clear (*r); syx_free (r);        \
01087       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (ret)); }                        \
01088   else                                                                        \
01089     { SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_large_integer_new_mpz (r)); }
01090 
01091 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
01092 #define _DO_OP(op)                                \
01093   _GET_Z2R;                                        \
01094   _GET_OP2;                                        \
01095   _NEW_R;                                        \
01096   op (*r, *z, *op2);                                \
01097   _RET_R
01098 #else
01099 #define _DO_OP(op) SYX_PRIM_FAIL
01100 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
01101 
01102 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
01103 #define _CMP_OP(op)                                                \
01104   _GET_Z2;                                                        \
01105   _GET_OP2;                                                        \
01106   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_boolean_new (mpz_cmp (*z, *op2) op 0));
01107 #else
01108 #define _CMP_OP(op) SYX_PRIM_FAIL
01109 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
01110 
01111

01115 {

01117 }

01120 {
01121   _DO_OP (mpz_sub);
01122 }
01123 
01124 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_lt)
01125 {
01126   _CMP_OP (<);
01127 }
01128 
01129 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_gt)
01130 {
01131   _CMP_OP (>);
01132 }
01133 
01134 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_le)
01135 {
01136   _CMP_OP (<=);
01137 }
01138 
01139 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_ge)
01140 {
01141   _CMP_OP (>=);
01142 }
01143 
01144 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_eq)
01145 {
01146   _CMP_OP (==);
01147 }
01148 
01149 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_ne)
01150 {
01151   _CMP_OP (!=);
01152 }
01153 
01154 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_div)
01155 {
01156 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
01157   _GET_Z2R;
01158   _GET_OP2;
01159   _NEW_R;
01160   if (!mpz_divisible_p (*z, *op2))
01161     {
01162       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01163     }
01164 
01165   mpz_divexact (*r, *z, *op2);
01166   _RET_R;
01167 #else
01168   SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01169 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
01170 }
01171 
01172 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_intDiv)
01173 {
01174   _DO_OP (mpz_fdiv_q);
01175 }
01176 
01177 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_quo)
01178 {
01179   _DO_OP (mpz_tdiv_q);
01180 }
01181 
01182 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_mul)
01183 {
01184   _DO_OP (mpz_mul);
01185 }
01186 
01187 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_mod)
01188 {
01189   _DO_OP (mpz_fdiv_r);
01190 }
01191 
01192 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_bitAnd)
01193 {
01194   _DO_OP (mpz_and);
01195 }
01196 
01197 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_bitOr)
01198 {
01199   _DO_OP (mpz_ior);
01200 }
01201 
01202 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_bitXor)
01203 {
01204   _DO_OP (mpz_xor);
01205 }
01206 
01207 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_bitShift)
01208 {
01209 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
01210   syx_int32 shift;
01211   _GET_ZR;
01212   _NEW_R;
01213   if (!SYX_IS_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[0]))
01214     {
01215       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01216     }
01217   
01218   shift = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[0]);
01219   if (shift > 0)
01220     mpz_mul_2exp (*r, *z, shift);
01221   else if (shift < 0)
01222     mpz_fdiv_q_2exp (*r, *z, -shift);
01223   else
01224     {
01225       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (es->message_receiver);
01226     }
01227 
01228   _RET_R;
01229 #else
01230   SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01231 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
01232 }
01233 
01234 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE(LargeInteger_asFloat)
01235 {
01236 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
01237   _GET_Z;
01238   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_float_new (mpz_get_d (*z)));
01239 #else
01240   SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01241 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
01242 }

01250   mpz_clear (*z);
01251   SYX_PRIM_RETURN(syx_nil);
01252 #else
01253   SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01254 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
01255 }

01298 
01299 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Float_div)
01300 {
01301   SyxOop first, second;
01302   SYX_PRIM_ARGS (1);
01303 
01304   first = es->message_receiver;
01305   second = es->message_arguments[0];
01306   if (!SYX_OBJECT_IS_FLOAT (second))
01307     {
01308       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01309     }
01310   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_float_new (SYX_OBJECT_FLOAT (first) /
01311                                   SYX_OBJECT_FLOAT (second)));
01312 }

01419 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Float_ceil)
01420 {
01421   double ret = ceil (SYX_OBJECT_FLOAT (es->message_receiver));
01422 
01423   if (!SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_CAN_EMBED (ret))
01424     {
01425 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
01426       mpz_t *r;
01427       _NEW_R;
01428       mpz_init_set_d (*r, ret);
01429       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_large_integer_new_mpz (r));
01430 #else
01431       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01432 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
01433     }
01434 
01435   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (ret));
01436 }
01437 
01438 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Float_floor)
01439 {

01441 
01442   if (!SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_CAN_EMBED (ret))
01443     {
01444 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
01445       mpz_t *r;
01446       _NEW_R;
01447       mpz_init_set_d (*r, ret);
01448       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_large_integer_new_mpz (r));
01449 #else
01450       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01451 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
01452     }
01453 
01454   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (ret));
01455 }
01456 
01457 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Float_trunc)
01458 {
01459   int ret = (int) SYX_OBJECT_FLOAT (es->message_receiver);
01460 
01461   if (!SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_CAN_EMBED (ret))
01462     {
01463 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
01464       mpz_t *r;
01465       _NEW_R;
01466       mpz_init_set_d (*r, ret);
01467       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_large_integer_new_mpz (r));
01468 #else
01469       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01470 #endif /* HAVE_LIBGMP */
01471     }
01472 
01473   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (ret));
01474 }

01476 
01477 /* Date and time */
01478 
01479 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (DateTime_gmTime)
01480 {
01481   time_t t;
01482   struct tm *gm;
01483   SyxOop ret;
01484   
01485   t = time (NULL);
01486   gm = gmtime (&t);
01487   if (!gm)
01488     {
01489       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01490     }
01491 
01492   ret = syx_array_new_size (8);
01493   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(ret)[0] = syx_small_integer_new (gm->tm_sec);
01494   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(ret)[1] = syx_small_integer_new (gm->tm_min);
01495   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(ret)[2] = syx_small_integer_new (gm->tm_hour);
01496   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(ret)[3] = syx_small_integer_new (gm->tm_mday);
01497   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(ret)[4] = syx_small_integer_new (gm->tm_mon);
01498   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(ret)[5] = syx_small_integer_new (gm->tm_year);
01499   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(ret)[6] = syx_small_integer_new (gm->tm_wday);
01500   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(ret)[7] = syx_small_integer_new (gm->tm_yday);
01501   
01502   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (ret);
01503 }

01506 /* Object memory and Smalltalk */
01507 
01508 
01509 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (ObjectMemory_snapshot)
01510 {
01511   SyxOop filename;
01512   syx_bool ret;
01513   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
01514   
01515   filename = es->message_arguments[0];
01516 
01517   /* store the returned object for this process before saving the image */
01518   syx_interp_stack_push (es->message_receiver);
01519 
01520   if (SYX_IS_NIL (filename))
01521     ret = syx_memory_save_image (NULL);
01522   else
01523     ret = syx_memory_save_image (SYX_OBJECT_STRING (filename));
01524 
01525   if (!ret)
01526     {
01527       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01528     }
01529 
01530   return FALSE;
01531 }
01532 
01533 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (ObjectMemory_garbageCollect)
01534 {
01535   syx_memory_gc ();
01536   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (es->message_receiver);
01537 }
01538 
01539 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (ObjectMemory_atDataPut)
01540 {
01541   SyxOop source;
01542   SyxOop dest;
01543   syx_bool has_refs;
01544   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
01545 
01546   source = es->message_arguments[1];
01547   dest = es->message_arguments[0];
01548   has_refs = SYX_OBJECT_HAS_REFS(source);
01549 
01550   if (has_refs != SYX_OBJECT_HAS_REFS(dest))
01551     {
01552       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01553     }
01554   syx_free (SYX_OBJECT_DATA(dest));
01555   if (has_refs)
01556     SYX_OBJECT_DATA(dest) = (SyxOop *) syx_memdup (SYX_OBJECT_DATA(source),
01557                                                    SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(source), sizeof (SyxOop));
01558   else
01559     SYX_OBJECT_DATA(dest) = (SyxOop *) syx_memdup (SYX_OBJECT_DATA(source),
01560                                                    SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(source), sizeof (syx_int8));
01561   SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(dest) = SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(source);
01562   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (es->message_receiver);
01563 }
01564 
01565 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (ObjectMemory_setConstant)
01566 {
01567   SyxOop oop = es->message_arguments[0];
01568   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
01569   if (SYX_IS_OBJECT (oop))
01570     {
01571       SYX_OBJECT_IS_CONSTANT(oop) = TRUE;
01572     }
01573   SYX_PRIM_RETURN(es->message_receiver);
01574 }
01575 
01576 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Smalltalk_quit)
01577 {
01578   syx_int32 status = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[0]);
01579   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
01580   syx_quit ();
01581   exit (status);
01582 }
01583 
01584 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Smalltalk_pluginCall)
01585 {
01586   SyxOop message_arguments[0xFF];
01587   syx_varsize message_arguments_count;
01588   SyxOop plugin = es->message_arguments[0];
01589   syx_symbol plugin_name = NULL;
01590   SyxOop func = es->message_arguments[1];
01591   SyxOop arguments = es->message_arguments[2];
01592   syx_bool ret;
01593 
01594   if (SYX_IS_NIL (func))
01595     {
01596       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01597     }
01598 
01599   if (!SYX_IS_NIL (plugin))
01600     plugin_name = SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (plugin);
01601 
01602   /* save the real state */
01603   memcpy (message_arguments, es->message_arguments, es->message_arguments_count * sizeof (SyxOop));
01604   message_arguments_count = es->message_arguments_count;
01605   es->message_arguments_count = SYX_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE(arguments);
01606   memcpy (es->message_arguments, SYX_OBJECT_DATA (arguments), es->message_arguments_count * sizeof (SyxOop));
01607 
01608   ret = syx_plugin_call (es, plugin_name, SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (func), method);
01609 
01610   /* restore the state */
01611   memcpy (es->message_arguments, message_arguments, message_arguments_count * sizeof (SyxOop));
01612   es->message_arguments_count = message_arguments_count;
01613 
01614   return ret;
01615 }
01616 
01617 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Smalltalk_pluginSymbol)
01618 {
01619   SyxOop plugin;
01620   SyxOop func;
01621   syx_symbol func_name;
01622   syx_symbol plugin_name;
01623   SyxOop oop;
01624   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
01625 
01626   plugin = es->message_arguments[0];
01627   func = es->message_arguments[1];
01628   plugin_name = NULL;
01629 
01630   if (SYX_IS_NIL (func))
01631     {
01632       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01633     }
01634 
01635   if (!SYX_IS_NIL (plugin))
01636     plugin_name = SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (plugin);
01637 
01638   func_name = SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (func);
01639 
01640   oop = SYX_POINTER_CAST_OOP (syx_plugin_symbol (plugin_name, func_name));
01641   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (oop);
01642 }
01643 
01644 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Smalltalk_loadPlugin)

01654     name = SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (oop);

01656 }

01679 
01680 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (CompiledMethod_runOn)
01681 {
01682   SyxOop context;
01683   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
01684 
01685   context = syx_method_context_new (es->message_receiver, es->message_arguments[0], es->message_arguments[1]);
01686

01688 }
01689 
01690 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Compiler_parse)
01691 {
01692   SyxLexer *lexer;
01693   SyxParser *parser;
01694   SyxOop string;
01695   SyxOop meth;
01696   SyxOop klass;
01697   SYX_PRIM_ARGS (3);
01698   
01699   string = es->message_arguments[0];
01700   meth = es->message_arguments[1];
01701   klass = es->message_arguments[2];
01702   lexer = syx_lexer_new (SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (string));
01703   parser = syx_parser_new (lexer, meth, klass);
01704   if (!syx_parser_parse (parser, FALSE))
01705     {
01706       syx_lexer_free (lexer, FALSE);
01707       syx_parser_free (parser, FALSE);
01708       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01709     }
01710 
01711   syx_lexer_free (lexer, FALSE);
01712   syx_free (parser->instance_names);
01713   syx_parser_free (parser, FALSE);
01714 
01715   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (meth);
01716 }
01717 
01718 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (Compiler_parseChunk)
01719 {
01720   SyxLexer *lexer;
01721   SyxParser *parser;
01722   SyxOop meth;
01723   SyxOop pos;
01724   SyxToken token;
01725   SyxLexer saved_lexer;
01726   syx_symbol all_text;
01727   syx_int32 index;
01728   syx_string text;
01729   SYX_PRIM_ARGS (2);
01730 
01731   all_text = SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL (es->message_arguments[0]);
01732   pos = es->message_arguments[1];
01733   index = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (SYX_OBJECT_DATA(pos)[0]);
01734 
01735   lexer = syx_lexer_new (all_text);
01736   lexer->_current_text += index;
01737 
01738   /* check for methods definition */
01739   saved_lexer = *lexer;
01740   token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
01741   while (token.type == SYX_TOKEN_BINARY && !strcmp (token.value.string, "!"))
01742     {
01743       if (!syx_cold_parse_methods (lexer))
01744         {
01745           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01746         }
01747       saved_lexer = *lexer;
01748       token = syx_lexer_next_token (lexer);
01749     }
01750   *lexer = saved_lexer;
01751 
01752   /* get the next chunk */
01753   text = syx_lexer_next_chunk (lexer);
01754   SYX_OBJECT_DATA(pos)[0] = syx_small_integer_new (lexer->_current_text - lexer->text);
01755   syx_lexer_free (lexer, FALSE);
01756 
01757   if (!text)
01758     {
01759       SYX_PRIM_RETURN (es->message_receiver);
01760     }
01761 
01762   /* now parse */
01763   lexer = syx_lexer_new (text);
01764   meth = syx_method_new ();
01765   parser = syx_parser_new (lexer, meth, syx_nil);
01766   if (!syx_parser_parse (parser, TRUE))
01767     {
01768       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01769     }
01770   syx_parser_free (parser, TRUE);
01771   SYX_METHOD_SELECTOR(meth) = syx_symbol_new ("goDoIt");
01772 
01773   /* finally execute */
01774   _syx_interp_frame_prepare_new (es, meth);
01775 
01776   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (es->message_receiver);
01777 }
01778 
01779 /* CPointer */
01780 
01781 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (CPointer_free)
01782 {
01783   SyxOop ptr;
01784   ptr = es->message_receiver;
01785   if (!SYX_IS_NIL (ptr))
01786     syx_free (SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (ptr));
01787   
01788   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (es->message_receiver);
01789 }
01790 
01791 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (CPointer_asString)
01792 {
01793   SyxOop ptr;
01794   SyxOop ret;
01795   ptr = es->message_receiver;
01796   if (!SYX_IS_NIL (ptr))
01797     ret = syx_string_new (SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (ptr));
01798   else
01799     ret = syx_nil;
01800 
01801   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (ret);
01802 }
01803 
01804 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (CPointer_asByteArray)
01805 {
01806   SyxOop ptr;
01807   SyxOop ret;
01808   syx_int32 size;
01809   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(1);
01810 
01811   ptr = es->message_receiver;
01812   size = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER(es->message_arguments[0]);
01813   if (!SYX_IS_NIL (ptr))
01814     ret = syx_byte_array_new (size, SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (ptr));
01815   else
01816     ret = syx_nil;
01817 
01818   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (ret);
01819 }
01820 
01821 /* CStruct */
01822 
01823 static SyxOop type_char;
01824 static SyxOop type_short_int;
01825 static SyxOop type_int;
01826 static SyxOop type_long;
01827 static SyxOop type_pointer;
01828 static SyxOop type_float;
01829 static SyxOop type_double;
01830 
01831 INLINE void
01832 _CStruct_initialize_types (void)
01833 {
01834   static syx_bool _initialized = FALSE;
01835 
01836   if (!_initialized)
01837     {
01838       type_char = syx_symbol_new ("char");
01839       type_short_int = syx_symbol_new ("shortInt");
01840       type_int = syx_symbol_new ("int");
01841       type_long = syx_symbol_new ("long");
01842       type_pointer = syx_symbol_new ("pointer");
01843       type_float = syx_symbol_new ("float");
01844       type_double = syx_symbol_new ("double");
01845 
01846       _initialized = TRUE;
01847     }
01848 }
01849 
01850 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (CStruct_on_type_at)
01851 {
01852   SyxOop type;
01853   SyxOop ret;
01854   char *handle;
01855   syx_int32 offset;
01856   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
01857 
01858   _CStruct_initialize_types ();
01859 
01860   handle = SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (es->message_arguments[0]);
01861   type = es->message_arguments[1];
01862   offset = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[2]);
01863   
01864   if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_char))
01865     ret = syx_character_new (*(handle+offset));
01866   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_short_int))
01867     ret = syx_small_integer_new (*(syx_int16 *)(handle+offset));
01868   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_int))
01869     {
01870       ret = syx_small_integer_new (*(syx_int32 *)(handle+offset));
01871       if (!SYX_SMALL_INTEGER_CAN_EMBED (ret))
01872         {
01873           /* FIXME: turn into LargeInteger */
01874           SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01875         }
01876     }
01877   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_long))
01878     {
01879       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01880     }
01881   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_pointer))
01882     ret = SYX_POINTER_CAST_OOP (*(syx_pointer *)(handle+offset));
01883   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_pointer))
01884     ret = SYX_POINTER_CAST_OOP (*(syx_pointer *)(handle+offset));
01885   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_float))
01886     ret = syx_float_new ((syx_double)(*(syx_float *)(handle+offset)));
01887   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_double))
01888     ret = syx_float_new (*(syx_double *)(handle+offset));
01889   else
01890     {
01891       /* It's a nested struct */
01892       ret = SYX_POINTER_CAST_OOP (handle+offset);
01893     }
01894 
01895   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (ret);
01896 }
01897 
01898 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (CStruct_on_type_at_put)
01899 {
01900   SyxOop type;
01901   SyxOop value;
01902   char *handle;
01903   syx_int32 offset;
01904   SYX_PRIM_ARGS(2);
01905   handle = SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (es->message_arguments[0]);
01906   type = es->message_arguments[1];
01907   offset = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (es->message_arguments[2]);
01908   value = es->message_arguments[3];
01909   
01910   _CStruct_initialize_types ();
01911 
01912   if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_char))
01913     *(handle+offset) = SYX_CHARACTER (value);
01914   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_short_int))
01915     *(syx_int16 *)(handle+offset) = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (value);
01916   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_int))
01917     *(syx_int32 *)(handle+offset) = SYX_SMALL_INTEGER (value);
01918   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_long))
01919     {
01920       /* TODO */
01921       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01922     }
01923   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_pointer))
01924     *(syx_pointer *)(handle+offset) = SYX_OOP_CAST_POINTER (value);
01925   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_float))
01926     *(syx_float *)(handle+offset) = (syx_float) SYX_OBJECT_FLOAT (value);
01927   else if (SYX_OOP_EQ (type, type_double))
01928     *(syx_double *)(handle+offset) = SYX_OBJECT_FLOAT (value);
01929   else
01930     {
01931       /* TODO: nested structures */
01932       SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
01933     }
01934 
01935   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (es->message_receiver);
01936 }
01937 
01938 /* CStructFieldType */
01939 
01940 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (CStructFieldType_sizeOfLong)
01941 {
01942   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (sizeof (syx_nint)));
01943 }
01944 
01945 SYX_FUNC_PRIMITIVE (CStructFieldType_sizeOfPointer)
01946 {
01947   SYX_PRIM_RETURN (syx_small_integer_new (sizeof (syx_pointer)));
01948 }
01949

02102 
02103 syx_int32
02104 syx_primitive_get_index (syx_symbol name)
02105 {
02106   syx_int32 i;
02107 
02108   for (i=0; i < SYX_PRIMITIVES_MAX; i++)
02109     {
02110       if (!strcmp (_syx_primitive_entries[i].name, name))
02111         return i;
02112     }
02113 
02114   return -1;
02115 }
